price: «አትክልትህንም በገባህ ጊዜ አላህ የሻው ይኾናል፤ በአላህ ቢኾን እንጂ ኀይል የለም፤ አትልም ኖሯልን እኔን በገንዘብም በልጅም ካንተ በጣም ያነስኩ ሆኜ ብታየኝ፡፡
arabic: وَلَوۡلَآ إِذۡ دَخَلۡتَ جَنَّتَكَ قُلۡتَ مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِٱللَّهِۚ إِن تَرَنِ أَنَا۠ أَقَلَّ مِنكَ مَالٗا وَوَلَدٗا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walawlā idh dakhalta jannataka qul'ta mā shāa al-lahu lā quwwata illā bil-lahi in tarani anā aqalla minka mālan wawaladan
